forum.content:
You said you love the rains,
But your smiles were always sweeter when the rainbows were there~

You said you love the sun,
But your eyes were always brighter when you were beneath the stars~

You said you love the winds,
but you were always more enchanting when the lakes reflect the landscapes like a mirror ~

You said you love me,
But ......
You are always happier when you are in my memory.
forum.title: The Gift for My Memory's Her.
